    • Method Detail

      • getHex

        public static String getHex(byte[] raw,
                            boolean uppercase)
        Convert an array of bytes to an hexa string.
        Parameters:
        raw - An array of bytes.
        uppercase - true to write hexa chars in uppercase false to write hexa chars in lowercase
        Returns:
        The hexa string conversion of that bytes; each byte is represented with 2 hexa chars.

      • getHex

        public static String getHex(byte[] raw,
                            int start,
                            int length,
                            boolean uppercase)
        Convert an array of bytes to an hexa string.
        Parameters:
        raw - An array of bytes.
        start - The start offset.
        length - The length of bytes to convert.
        uppercase - true to write hexa chars in uppercase false to write hexa chars in lowercase
        Returns:
        The hexa string conversion of that bytes; each byte is represented with 2 hexa chars.

      • indexOf

        public static int indexOf(String string,
                          char[] chars)
        Returns the index within a string of the first occurrence of the specified substring. If no such value of k exists, then -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        string - The substring to search for.
        chars - The characters of the substring to search.
        Returns:
        The index of the first occurrence of the specified substring, or -1 if there is no such occurrence.

      • isVoid

        public static boolean isVoid(String string)
        Indicates whether a string is void or undefined.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to test.
        Returns:
        true if the string is null or has no character, false otherwise.

      • removeDiacritics

        public static String removeDiacritics(String input)
        Remove diacritics from a string, e.g. "côté" gives "cote".
        Parameters:
        input - The string to process.
        Returns:
        A string without diacritics.
